column4: In case I missed your reply.  After installing ubuntu from a live cd, made by remastersys backup iso, my printer services is missing but everything is fine if loaded off live cd any help here?
stop repeating yourself. Also, try sudo apt-get purge cupsys cupsys-client && sudo apt-get install cupsys cupsys-client
I take that back, I hallucinated the repeat. I apologize
sorry your instructions didn't help and no you didn't hallucinated I'm repeating cause someone here said to do so to get answwers
